product1.name: Delicious Camisole
product1.marketingCopy: Lace trim accentuates the neckline of this lightweight Camisole by Only Hearts

product2.name: Bracelet 41 in Silver
product2.marketingCopy: Rustic links adorn a unisex bracelet. 1-100 jewelry gives an organic feel while maintaining an understated elegance.

product3.name: Iranta Leather Dress in Black
product3.marketingCopy: Supple and stretchy, the Iranta dress from by Malene Birger is as sleek as they come.

product4.name: Lio Shirt in Grey
product4.marketingCopy: Understated yet classic, Hannes Roether’s pieces offer versatility through timeless silhouette.

product5.name: Leather Loafer in Lime
product5.marketingCopy: Not your Grandpa’s shoes. These Loafers from Verba are classic in silhouette, yet contemporary with a vegetable-dyed, calf leather body. Leather trim.
